meanings.definition: In the form of a table.
meanings.sent1: The tabular data made it easy to compare the information.
meanings.sent2: The report presented the findings in a tabular format.
meanings.sent3: The tabular layout of the room made it look organized and neat.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were tabular, neatly arranged and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The tabular structure of the building resembled a giant puzzle.

meanings.definition: Arranged in or consisting of tables.
meanings.sent1: The tabular arrangement of chairs made the room look spacious.
meanings.sent2: The tabular design of the website allowed for easy navigation.
meanings.sent3: The tabular setup for the event made it feel like a fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in a tabular manner, categorizing everything into lists.
meanings.sent5: The tabular display of products in the store made it simple to find what you needed.
